column2: "Far too many ARKS members prefer to go at it alone. Well what about teamwork? Not to mention that partnering up makes venturing out a lot safer."
"If you have a person's partner card, that means you can bring them with you on adventures. And you'd be a fool not to, if you ask me."
"And what about you? Now that we're on the subject, maybe you ought to set out with a partner yourself. Do it. Go."
"Where? Haven't you been listening? Go on an adventure with a partner! In fact, here's my partner card."
"Well, what are you waiting for? Let's go on that adventure together already. That's what being in ARKS is all about."
"You can now invite Jean to join you as a partner."

"<yellow>*This client order in which you will have Jean accompany you will be easier to complete if you set a password in the \"Party Info\" menu and select the \"Limit multiplayer requests from other parties\" option when accepting it.<c>"
